dao

Interface InvoiceDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    InvoiceDAOJDBC

    public interface InvoiceDAO
    This interface represents a contract for a DAO for the Invoice model. Note that all methods which returns the Invoice from the DB, will not fill the model with the password, due to security reasons.
    Author:
    Ahmed Gamal

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void create(Invoice Invoice)
      Create the given Invoice in the database.
      void delete(Invoice Invoice)
      Delete the given Invoice from the database.
      Invoice find(java.lang.Long id)
      Returns the Invoice from the database matching the given ID, otherwise null.
      java.util.List<Invoice> getInvoicesOfCustomer(java.lang.Long customerId)
      Returns a list of Invoices history per Customer from the database ordered by Invoice ID.
      java.util.List<Invoice> getInvoicesOfCustomersOfMonth(java.lang.Long customerID, int invoiceDate)
      Returns a list of all Invoices from the database ordered by Invoice ID.
      java.util.List<Invoice> getShopInvoicesOfCustomersPerMonth(java.lang.Long customerID, int invoiceDate, java.lang.String invoiceType)
      Returns a list of Shope Invoices from the database ordered by Invoice ID.
      java.util.List<Invoice> getShopInvoicesOfPerAddress(java.lang.Long customerID, java.lang.String addressID)
      Returns a list of Invoices history per address from the database ordered by Invoice ID.
      java.util.List<Invoice> list()
      Returns a list of all Invoices from the database ordered by Invoice ID.
      void update(Invoice Invoice)
      Update the given Invoice in the database.

    • Method Detail

      • find

        Invoice find(java.lang.Long id)
      throws DAOException
        Returns the Invoice from the database matching the given ID, otherwise null.
        Parameters:
        id - The ID of the Invoice to be returned.
        Returns:
        The Invoice from the database matching the given ID, otherwise null.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If something fails at database level.

      • getInvoicesOfCustomersOfMonth

        java.util.List<Invoice> getInvoicesOfCustomersOfMonth(java.lang.Long customerID,
                                                      int invoiceDate)
                                               throws DAOException
        Returns a list of all Invoices from the database ordered by Invoice ID. that it's start date equal the given start date and for specific cutomerid
        Returns:
        A list of all Invoices from the database ordered by Invoice ID.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If something fails at database level.

      • getShopInvoicesOfCustomersPerMonth

        java.util.List<Invoice> getShopInvoicesOfCustomersPerMonth(java.lang.Long customerID,
                                                           int invoiceDate,
                                                           java.lang.String invoiceType)
                                                    throws DAOException
        Returns a list of Shope Invoices from the database ordered by Invoice ID. that it's start date equal the given start date and for specific cutomerid
        Returns:
        A list of all Invoices from the database ordered by Invoice ID.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If something fails at database level.

      • getShopInvoicesOfPerAddress

        java.util.List<Invoice> getShopInvoicesOfPerAddress(java.lang.Long customerID,
                                                    java.lang.String addressID)
                                             throws DAOException
        Returns a list of Invoices history per address from the database ordered by Invoice ID. for specific cutomerid
        Returns:
        A list of all Invoices per address from the database ordered by Invoice ID.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If something fails at database level.

      • getInvoicesOfCustomer

        java.util.List<Invoice> getInvoicesOfCustomer(java.lang.Long customerId)
                                       throws DAOException
        Returns a list of Invoices history per Customer from the database ordered by Invoice ID. for specific cutomerid
        Returns:
        A list of all Invoices of cutomer from the database ordered by Invoice ID.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If something fails at database level.

      • list

        java.util.List<Invoice> list()
                      throws DAOException
        Returns a list of all Invoices from the database ordered by Invoice ID. The list is never null and is empty when the database does not contain any Invoice.
        Returns:
        A list of all Invoices from the database ordered by Invoice ID.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If something fails at database level.

      • create

        void create(Invoice Invoice)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
            DAOException
        Create the given Invoice in the database. The Invoice ID must be null, otherwise it will throw IllegalArgumentException. After creating, the DAO will set the obtained ID in the given Invoice.
        Parameters:
        Invoice - The Invoice to be created in the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the Invoice ID is not null.
        DAOException - If something fails at database level.

      • update

        void update(Invoice Invoice)
     throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException,
            DAOException
        Update the given Invoice in the database. The Invoice ID must not be null, otherwise it will throw IllegalArgumentException. Note: the password will NOT be updated. Use changePassword() instead.
        Parameters:
        Invoice - The Invoice to be updated in the database.
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If the Invoice ID is null.
        DAOException - If something fails at database level.

      • delete

        void delete(Invoice Invoice)
     throws DAOException
        Delete the given Invoice from the database. After deleting, the DAO will set the ID of the given Invoice to null.
        Parameters:
        Invoice - The Invoice to be deleted from the database.
        Throws:
        DAOException - If something fails at database level.
